name: Faceless Wanderer
description: The Faceless Wanderer appears as a shifting, formless entity, lacking any facial features or distinct form, making it unsettling to behold. It has a ghostly presence and floats through the air, leaving a chilling aura.
memorable: Notably drains memories and can cause targets to forget encounters with it, posing a unique threat to adventurers.
goals: To manipulate and drain the memories of its victims, gaining an upper hand in encounters.
relations: Often serves as a herald of chaos or madness, related to creatures that manipulate the mind.
environment: Typically found in dark, mysterious locations, often in realms of nightmares or places affected by magic.
strengths: Immune to poison and psychic damage, can regenerate health, and drains memories from sua victims.
weaknesses: Vulnerable due to a relatively low Armor Class of 13 and can be caught off guard easily.
attacks: Uses claws to inflict slashing and psychic damage, and employs the Memory Drain ability to cause significant harm.
most_powerful_ability: The Memory Drain ability can reduce an enemy's Intelligence and even create new Faceless Wanderers from slain humanoids.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without needing to see them.
additional_information: Regenerates 5 hit points at the start of its turn unless recently interacted with.
Can manipulate memories to disorient foes.
Appears in ghostly vapor form when reduced to 0 hit points.
Drains both life and intellect, making it a fearsome predator.
Leaves a chilling aura that unsettles those nearby.
test_queries: unsettling faceless creature that drains memories
medium aberration with memory draining abilities
creature that regenerates health and drains intelligence
haunting entity lurking in dark places
memory manipulation monster that causes amnesia
